descriptions:
["DescriptionBoasting some of the region's most attractive landscapes and amenities, Yas Acres puts community at its heart, providing you with solid ground to lay down roots and build memories. Yas Acres embraces a love of leisure and provides you with a world of possibilities to explore and experience at your pace. Whether it is on the golf course, at the mall, by the pool or simply at home with family, Yas Acres offers you the space to nurture the lifestyle of your choice and cherish the moments that matter the most to you.
It is a multipurpose hub for entertainment, shopping and tourism, connected to the mainland through a comprehensively linked road network.It is already home to the Yas Marina Circuit, which hosts the Abu Dhabi Formula 1 Grand Prix each year. It boasts major retail in the form of Yas Mall and IKEA. Two theme parks are in operation - Yas Waterworld and Ferrari World - with more marked out for development in the future. Yas Island is home to exceptional hospitality and leisure venues such as Yas Links, Yas Marina, Yas Plaza, The Viceroy and du Arena. Looking to the future, the population is expected to grow significantly with many more projects planned and under development.The Yas Acres Golf & Country Club will also include a wide range of facilities for the entire family such as a multipurpose sports hall, squash and tennis courts, kids activity area, spa and swimming pools.                                            
Running through the middle of Yas Acres with the golf course from one side and public parks which open out onto North Yas Island's waterfront from the other, Royal Oak speaks to the most sophisticated of homeowners.
Reach out to our team at Property Shop Investment to get more details about this property or to schedule a viewing. Call us on +971600548200 or access www.propertyshopinvestment.com."]

['DescriptionAchiever Properties is delighted to offer this brand new luxurious 5 Bedroom Villa, available for sale in District One, Mohammed Bin Rashid City. The Villa is situated on a big plot, bordered with natural surrounding creating a tranquil environment. The villa is corner villa and has a three side opening which allows natural light in the villa all day.
This particular villa is one of the closest situated villas to the lagoon.
This villa is ideal for a family and is the most prime location. The villa is situated internally facing the park.
It is designed in the highest quality design, with contemporary finishing. Generous living spaces, state of the art kitchen equipped with modern appliances, all bedrooms en-suit , marble and wood flooring, high ceiling and large windows that create a bright cozy atmosphere. 
Living in this new development, promises an unrivaled luxury lifestyle. Crystal lagoons and sublime beaches, sweeping parklands and breathtaking architecture make up this exciting development. Not forgetting how close you are to all major routes into the city, providing easy access to Downtown Dubai, DIFC, Burj Khalifa, Emirates Towers and Dubai International airport.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionAchiever Properties is delighted to offer the market this meticulously designed 4 Bedroom villa for sale.
The villa sits on a generous plot of 6,151 sq.ft, beautifully designed to maximize the usable space and light due to the large windows and high ceilings throughout the villa.
It features a large open plan living area, modern fitted kitchen and maids room on the ground level. Nested upstairs are 4 double bedrooms, each with fitted wardrobes, balconies and modern en-suite bathrooms. The villa comes with a double garage, a unique rooftop terrace, beautifully landscaped garden and private pool, a perfect home for a modern sized family.

['DescriptionRahul Rajan from The Urban Nest is proud to present this vacant property in the best tower in Dubai Marina.

•	
Bay central tower offers the best in luxury living combined with a modern lifestyle. There are many retail, shopping and dining outlets within close proximity to the development. Bay central tower is an outstanding destination in Dubai Marina with easy connectivity to all major highways and well know destinations within Dubai. The metro station is within walking distance of the development. The Central tower consists of studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments; there are also 3 bedroom penthouses and 4 bedroom villas. The Central Tower of Bay Central is the tallest building within the three building Bay Central Complex.']
